channel.title: Xoxzo Official Blog: Empowerment - Press Release

item.title: [Xoxzo] English support for Text To Speech (TTS) released
item.description: Type in what you would like to say out, and you can get it heard via our API. English TTS is supported!
item.dc:creator: Aiko Yokoyama

item.title: [Xoxzo] New rebate rates for 24 hours DIN subsciption
item.description: Xoxzo released a new rebate function for DIN 24 hours only subscription.
item.dc:creator: Aiko Yokoyama

item.title: [Xoxzo] TTS for Japanese released
item.description: Simply type any text messages and you can collaborate the voice created into your any of Xoxzo voice API.
item.dc:creator: Aiko Yokoyama

item.title: Change of Trading Name
item.description: MARIMORE Inc changed it's trading name to Xoxzo Inc.
item.dc:creator: Aiko Yokoyama
